text.more: The graph generated in Gephi from the Wikipedia pages for Baldur's Gate, Mass Effect, and Dragon Age was created to analyze the connections between these three iconic RPGs. The graph connects the links present on each of these pages, revealing the relationships between the content associated with these games. The resulting structure shows how the three RPGs are interconnected through common references, such as developers, publications, and narrative themes. Centrality metrics and network visualization allow you to identify central and important pages, such as game developers, reviews and influential articles, providing a deeper understanding of the interconnectivity and influence of these works in the world of electronic games.
text.intro: The graph generated in Gephi from the Wikipedia pages for Baldur's Gate, Mass Effect, and Dragon Age was created to analyze the connections between these three iconic RPGs.
text.title: Wikipedia Network
